entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bouctouche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:33 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kouchibouguac 5:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: -3.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 34 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -17.5°C
Wind: W 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to ice pellets late in the morning then to flurries late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries ending before morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
